```{r, results = 'asis'}
    Management_history = read.table('./txt_files/YTRK.Mgmt.Hist.table2.txt', header=TRUE)

    colnames(Management_history)=c('Regulation date',
                                   'Location',
                                   'Regulation')

    Management_history.table = xtable(Management_history, 
                                  caption ='Regulations history for yellowtail rockfish (Northern and Southern stocks).',
                                  label = 'tab:Management_history',
                                  digits = 0)

    align(Management_history.table) = c('lp',
                       '>{\\centering}p{.60in}',
                       '>{\\centering}p{1.0in}',
                       '>{\\raggedright}p{4.20in}')

    print(Management_history.table, 
          include.rownames = FALSE,
          caption.placement = 'top',
          size="\\fontsize{9pt}{10pt}\\selectfont",
          sanitize.text.function = function(x){x})



```
